ResearchProjectDef.label: medicine production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce standard industrial-tech medicine by combining herbal medicine, neutroamine, and cloth.

ResearchProjectDef.label: passive cooler
ResearchProjectDef.description: Make passive coolers, to cool indoor spaces without using electricity.

ResearchProjectDef.label: pemmican
ResearchProjectDef.description: Make pemmican, a preserved mixture of meat and plant matter that doesn't go bad for a long time. Great for traveling.

ResearchProjectDef.label: beer brewing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build a brewery and fermenting vats to transform hops into tasty, tasty beer.

ResearchProjectDef.label: carpet making
ResearchProjectDef.description: Weave beautiful carpets from cloth.

ResearchProjectDef.label: noble apparel
ResearchProjectDef.description: Tailor noble-specific apparel like formal shirts and royal robes.

ResearchProjectDef.label: royal apparel
ResearchProjectDef.description: Tailor royal apparel of the highest tier, like royal robes and crowns.

ResearchProjectDef.label: smithing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build smithies for crafting metal weapons like knives, gladii, and maces. Work metal into clean, beautiful floor tiles.

ResearchProjectDef.label: harp
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft the harp, a simple stationary musical instrument popular among nobility in some cultures.

ResearchProjectDef.label: harpsichord
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft the harpsichord, a complex stationary musical instrument.

ResearchProjectDef.label: piano
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft the piano, an advanced stationary musical instrument.

ResearchProjectDef.label: plate armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Smith suits of plate armor from metal or wood. This heavy armor noticeably slows movement, but protects very effectively.

ResearchProjectDef.label: long blades
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft longswords and spears.

ResearchProjectDef.label: complex furniture
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build complex furniture like beds, end tables, dining chairs, armchairs, dressers, tool cabinets, billiard tables, and poker tables, vents, sarcophagi, and more.

ResearchProjectDef.label: complex clothing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Tailor complicated garments like pants, dusters, and cowboy hats.

ResearchProjectDef.label: shields
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build wearable shield gear. Shields use momentum-repulsion technology to prevent projectiles from traversing the field boundary.

ResearchProjectDef.label: multi-analyzer
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build multi-analyzers which increase research speed and allow higher-level research projects.

ResearchProjectDef.label: machining
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build machining tables to craft guns, grenades, flak armor, and to shred dead mechanoids for resources.

ResearchProjectDef.label: electricity
ResearchProjectDef.description: Harness the power of electricity for a hundred different tasks.

ResearchProjectDef.label: microelectronics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Work with complex microelectronics. This unlocks the hi-tech research bench and comms console.

ResearchProjectDef.label: mortars
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build mortars which can lob shells long distances - even over walls.

ResearchProjectDef.label: gunsmithing I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft simple manually-operated guns like revolvers, pump shotguns, bolt-action rifles, and incendiary launchers.

ResearchProjectDef.label: gunsmithing II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Production of a new generation of firearms to destroy heavily protected targets.

ResearchProjectDef.label: gunsmithing III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft high-power guns like chain shotguns, LMGs, and heavy SMGs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: pulse-charged munitions
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build weapons which fire pulse-charged munitions for extra damage. Note that these also require advanced components.

ResearchProjectDef.label: sterile materials
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct sterile tiles to make cleanrooms for safer and more effective medical treatment, research, and cooking.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Prosthetics III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build inexpensive prosthetic body parts to replace lost limbs. Requires a skilled doctor to attach.

ResearchProjectDef.label: bionic replacements
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build high-tech bionic body parts to replace lost limbs and eyes. Requires a skilled doctor to attach.

ResearchProjectDef.label: artificial metabolism
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft bionics that process food more safely or efficiently than a biological stomach.

ResearchProjectDef.label: neural computation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft brain implants that assist thought and learning by use of a direct, shallow brain-computer interface.

ResearchProjectDef.label: skin hardening
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft bionic implants which induce the toughening of natural skin, producing an armor-like effect.

ResearchProjectDef.label: healing factors
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft bionics that enhance natural healing processes.

ResearchProjectDef.label: flesh shaping
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft bionics which induce the reshaping of natural flesh, usually for the purposes of aesthetic enhancement or personal pleasure.

ResearchProjectDef.label: molecular analysis
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft bionics with molecular analyzers for assisting the immune system or analyzing food.

ResearchProjectDef.label: circadian influence
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft brain implants that chemically manipulate the circadian rhythm, reducing or altering the need to sleep.

ResearchProjectDef.label: brain wiring
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft brain implants that induce or prevent blunt sensations like joy or pain.

ResearchProjectDef.label: specialized limbs
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft specialized bionic limbs built for specific purposes - both combat and labor.

ResearchProjectDef.label: compact weaponry
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft compact, concealable bionic weapons which can be embedded in various body parts.

ResearchProjectDef.label: vitals monitor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build vitals monitors which improve medical outcomes when placed next to hospital beds.

ResearchProjectDef.label: transport pod
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct launchable transport pods that you can use to send people and supplies long distances across the planet's surface. Can be used for raiding, travel, sending gifts, and more.

ResearchProjectDef.label: biosculpting
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct biosculpter pods which can perform various biological alterations to colonists. These are especially important to believers in transhumanism.

ResearchProjectDef.label: neural supercharger
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct neural supercharger devices. Neural superchargers improve consciousness and learning rate, but they also increase hunger and the effect must be refreshed daily. Transhumanists often hold neural supercharging as an important practice.

ResearchProjectDef.label: jump packs
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build jump packs to perform aerial assaults during combat.

ResearchProjectDef.label: firefoam
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct firefoam poppers, automatic fire-safety devices which spread fire-retardant foam in response to encroaching flames.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Climate control
ResearchProjectDef.description: More sophisticated devices for careful control of air flow and temperature in rooms.

ResearchProjectDef.label: flatscreen television
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce high-resolution flatscreen televisions for greater enjoyment.

ResearchProjectDef.label: IEDs
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build improvised traps from any kind of mortar shell.

ResearchProjectDef.label: hydroponics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build hydroponics basins to rapidly grow crops indoors regardless of the terrain or weather outside.

ResearchProjectDef.label: flak armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft clothing with metal armor sewn in to resist bullets and explosions. This weighty armor slows movement slightly.

ResearchProjectDef.label: smokepop packs
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build smokepop packs which allow the wearer to deploy a defensive smokescreen.

ResearchProjectDef.label: nutrient paste
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build nutrient paste dispensers which efficiently produce edible meals from raw nutritive feedstocks, while requiring no labor at all.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Antibiotic production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to produce drugs to fight various diseases.

ResearchProjectDef.label: battery
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build batteries for storing electricity.

ResearchProjectDef.label: toxifier generator
ResearchProjectDef.description: Create toxifier generators which generate electricity, but also spread pollution around themselves.

ResearchProjectDef.label: xenogenetics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Create xenogerms which can be implanted in a person to genetically modify them. Extract genepacks from living people using a gene extractor so you can reimplant their genes into someone else.

ResearchProjectDef.label: deathrest
ResearchProjectDef.description: Those with the deathrest gene must periodically undergo a special deathrest coma that lasts several days. This research project allows you to construct buildings which accelerate the deathrest coma and confer specific bonuses on the deathrester. Over time, you can build a grand deathrest temple.

ResearchProjectDef.label: fertility procedures
ResearchProjectDef.description: Perform the surgeries necessary to create a test tube embryo from a fertile man and woman, then implant the embryo in a surrogate mother or growth vat. Also, perform sterilization surgeries on men and women.

ResearchProjectDef.label: basic mechtech
ResearchProjectDef.description: The technology needed for your mechanitor to create and control basic-tier mechanoids.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Watermill generator
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build watermill generators on rivers to generate a steady supply of power.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Renewable energy
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build solar panels for electricity generation.

ResearchProjectDef.label: geothermal power
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build geothermal power plants on top of steam geysers, for uninterrupted power.

ResearchProjectDef.label: deep drilling
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build deep drills for extracting resources from underground. You'll need a ground-penetrating scanner to find the resources.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Electric miner
ResearchProjectDef.description: Autonomous machine for mining rocks on the surface of the planet.

ResearchProjectDef.label: moisture pump
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct moisture pumps, which very slowly normalize the moisture in the ground around them. They can turn wet ground dry and convert soft sand into normal sand.

ResearchProjectDef.label: growth vats
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct growth vats which can gestate an embryo or accelerate a child's growth.

ResearchProjectDef.label: starflight sensors
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct long-range sensors for a starship. These sensors are essential for navigation, communication, and threat avoidance.
